name: Csaba Kiraly
description: Csaba is senior researcher in the Codex.storage Research group, working on compact proofs of storage, zero knowledge proofs, data availability, and p2p technologies. He is also part of a team working with the EF on the design of p2p networking for Data Availability Sampling. In the past, Csaba was working and publishing on various aspects of p2p networks, anonymity overlays, AI for microcontrollers (TinyML), IoT and wireless mesh technologies.
